snippet: Kevin Rivera, 21, the victim, and his ex-girlfriend, Amber Diaz, had just returned from their daughter’s first birthday party when a fight broke out, neighbors and relatives said.
abstract: Brooklyn police are seeking 81-year-old Nicolas Diaz in connection with stabbing death of Kevin Rivera; Diaz is said to have intervened in argument between Rivera and Amber Diaz, woman who is either his granddaughter or great-granddaughter.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Rivera, 21, the victim, and his ex-girlfriend, Amber Diaz, had just returned from their daughter’s first birthday party when a fight broke out, neighbors and relatives said.

headline.main: Brooklyn Man, 81, Is Sought in Fatal Stabbing of Relative’s Ex-Boyfriend
headline.print_headline: Police Seeking Man, 81, in Fatal Stabbing of Relative’s Former Boyfriend in Brooklyn
